Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24371 affecting package ceph for versions less than 18.2.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-24371 affecting package ceph for versions less than 18.2.2-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ceph is earlier than 18.2.2-3, affected by CVE-2020-24371
